meanings.definition: A type of Indian flatbread made with whole wheat flour and ghee.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious paratha for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: In India, people enjoy having paratha with their meals.
meanings.sent3: The paratha told a joke to the naan, and they both laughed.
meanings.sent4: The warm paratha was a comforting blanket for the spicy curry.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked paratha filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A popular breakfast or snack in South Asian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the street vendor sells hot paratha to commuters.
meanings.sent2: During tea time, many families gather to enjoy paratha together.
meanings.sent3: The paratha danced in the pan, sizzling with joy.
meanings.sent4: The golden-brown paratha was a shining star on the breakfast table.
meanings.sent5: The flaky layers of the paratha melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: Often stuffed with various fillings such as potatoes, paneer, or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I love the paratha filled with spicy potatoes.
meanings.sent2: At the restaurant, you can choose your favorite filling for the paratha.
meanings.sent3: The paratha juggled the fillings, trying to balance them perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The paratha was a treasure chest hiding delicious surprises inside.
meanings.sent5: The stuffed paratha burst with flavors with every bite.
